name: Old Seagal
description: Steven Seagal was so certain of his aikido skills that he once instigated stuntman Gene LeBell. Seagal claimed he could thwart any attempt at a judo choke hold. Reportedly, LeBell was successful and put him to sleep. According to lore, Seagal passed out and shit his pants. He is the hyperreal embodiment of perceived exceptionalism becoming more believable than it is. A true American hero... with Serbian citizenship.
